grammarScopes.title: Grammar Scopes
grammarScopes.description:
A list of grammar scopes to lint with Tidy.

By default, this package only lints HTML scopes known to work cleanly with Tidy. If you know of any HTML variants that Tidy works with without producing spurious errors, please [let us know](https://github.com/AtomLinter/linter-tidy/issues) so that we may improve the default list.

To find the grammar scopes used by a file, use the `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` command.

readme:
# linter-tidy

This package will lint your `.html` opened files in Atom through [tidy-html5][].

## Installation

*   Install [tidy-html5][]
*   `$ apm install linter-tidy`

## Settings

You can configure linter-tidy by editing ~/.atom/config.cson (choose Open Your
Config in Atom menu):

```coffeescript
'linter-tidy':
  'tidyExecutablePath': null # tidy path. run 'which tidy' to find the path
  'grammarScopes': [
    'text.html.basic'
  ] # A list of grammar scopes to lint with Tidy.
```

[tidy-html5]: http://www.html-tidy.org
